body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Deals Inc. My name is Jose Peterson. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, Kathryn. Could you provide me with your phone number, starting with the area code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, four four four, three three three three.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And can you also confirm your ZIP code, one zero zero two zero?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's correct, one zero zero two zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Kathryn. Is there anything specific that I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling confused about the shipping process for my recent car purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I see. Let me assist you with that. Thank you for sharing your concerns, Kathryn. I will help clarify the shipping process for you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Kathryn. If you have any further questions, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day!
